ValidationRule.description: If Completed Unsuccessfully then other fields are required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Complete_RFC__c , 'Unsuccessful'), ISPICKVAL ( Unsuccessful_Type__c, '' ), ISBLANK( Unsuccessful_Details__c ), ISPICKVAL ( NOC_Alert_Created__c, '') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When an RFC is completed Unsuccessful then the Type, Details, and NOC Alert must be populated
